name: PLANET BLOOD DEMO
description:
GAMEPLAY DEMO FOR TESTING PURPOSES

Planet Blood is fast-paced roguelike shoot-em-up set in the theme of a 70's Sci-Fi thriller. Play as the alien as you invade a human laboratory set up on your home planet.

This is a gameplay demo and only features a limited amount of content.

Any feedback is welcome!

You can send feedback to gnomearcproductions@gmail.com
